item.description:
This is the first race of the 2011 Will Run For Beer Race Series
http://www.willrunfor...

Join us to head up to Salisbury for a 5K or 10K road race... even if you're like me and doing it for the T-shirt!
The 30th Annual Hangover Classic! (really, who wouldn't want that shirt?)
http://xenia.unh.edu/...

I have changed the start up time to 10:30. We can meet at the Braintree Town Hall to carpool up to Salisbury together. The ride per mapquest will be 1 hour 15 minutes - 55.77 miles. Race starts at 12:45. This will give us time to park, check in and get settled before the race starts, and not rush right out of Braintree for those running a few minutes late.
If you'd like to join in for the optional polar bear plunge after the race, remember a towel and some warm clothes! (I'm game for the plunge if I have company! That mug would something to be proud of!)

Click on the link to the race to either register on line or print out and mail in a registration.
RACE IS OPEN TO ONLY 1200! If you plan on joining us, please register asap to confirm you have a spot!

Remember the post race party, and that this event is part of the Will Run For Beer racing series. Smuttynose Beer is a sponsor! :) Should be a fun post-race event!

--------------------------------------------------------------------------------

12:45 PM on Saturday, January 1, 2011.
Location: The Carousel Lounge, Salisbury Beach, MA
Post Race Party with Live Band: The Carousel Lounge, Salisbury Beach, MA
Commemorative 30th Annual Hangover Classic long sleeve tee-shirts.
Hangover Classic mugs to 1st 50 male and female finishers of 10K, first 25 male and female finishers of 5K.
Optional New Years Day Ocean Plunge!!! Special plunge mugs to first 600 fully submerged partakers.
(Note: In 2009 a total of 350 runners took the plunge . 600 mugs are on hand for 2010 No extra fee required)

Entry Fees:
Prior to 12-25-10: $20.00 With Long Sleeve Shirt
After 12-25-10 but prior to 12-29-10: $25.00 With Long Sleeve Shirt
Race Day Entry Fee: $25.00 (No Shirts Available)

*****RACE LIMITED TO FIRST 1200 TOTAL ENTRIES*****

group.name: The South Shore Fitness Meetup Group

item.name: 30th Annual Hangover Classic 5K or 10K Road Race (w/ optional polar bear plunge)
